name: IRC message
description: Matches IRC messages going in either direction between client and server
content:
:CalebDelnay!calebd@localhost QUIT :Bye bye!
:CalebDelnay!calebd@localhost JOIN #mychannel
:CalebDelnay!calebd@localhost MODE #mychannel -l
PING :irc.localhost.localdomain
:irc.localhost.localdomain 433 Caleb :Nickname is already in use
author: Garrett W.
